titles.title: The Greatness Of You
Jesus we lift up Your name

properties.copyright: 2004 Integrity's Hosanna! Music (Admin. by SCM Verlagsgruppe GmbH)Lakeview Media (Admin. by SCM Verlagsgruppe GmbH)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wanna sing of Your love, I wanna sing of Your mercy
I wanna tell the whole world of the greatness of You
So I'll sing of Your love and I'll sing of Your mercy
And I'll tell the whole world of the greatness of You
Of the greatness of You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
We lift up Your Name
We lift up Your Name
We lift up Your Name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I wanna sing of Your love I wanna sing of Your love
Wanna sing of Your mercy I wanna sing of Your mercy
I wanna tell the whole world I wanna tell the whole world
Of the greatness of You of the greatness of You
So I'll sing of Your love so I'll sing of Your love
And I'll sing of Your mercy and I'll sing of Your mercy
And I'll tell the whole world and I'll tell the whole world
Of the greatness of You of the greatness of You

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
Jesus, we lift up Your Name
Lord, we've come to lift You up
Give You praise and lift You up
Everything we lift you up

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Your Name is higher than the heavens
Greater than the nations, Jesus
Your Name is higher than the heavens
Greater than the nations, Jesus
Your Name is higher than the heavens
Greater than the nations, Jesus
